籤詩版本二:
Ngaqina umoya nemvula ngabuyela ekhaya, kodwa umzimba wami ufana nenkonjane
Ngibambe i-nio emlonyeni wami futhi ngifuna ukwenza isisekelo, kodwa ukuphela kwesisekelo kuphukile futhi intshebe igcwele udaka.
詩意:
Le hexagram imele umfanekiso wenkonjane ebambe i-Ni emlonyeni wayo.
Konke kuyakhandleka futhi kuyakhandla.
解曰: Zonke izinhlobo zamaqhinga. Ukusa nokuhwalala akumi. Kwazi bani lokhu. Phela, kuwumsebenzi onzima.
籤詩故事一:
◇U-Dong Yong wangcwaba uyise
U-Dong Yong Wobukhosi BakwaHan wayeyindoda yaseQiancheng. Umndeni wakubo wawumpofu futhi washonelwa unina esemncane, ngakho kwadingeka ondle uyise yedwa.
Lapho uyise eshona, u-Dong Yong wayengenayo imali yokumngcwaba, ngakho waboleka ama-yuan angu-10,000 kwabanye ukuze angcwabe uyise. Ngokuzayo, uma ngingenayo imali yokubuyisela, ngizoba yisigqila. Nsuku zonke kudingeka batheze umthwalo owodwa wezinkuni zokubasa, imithwalo emine yamanzi, namageja amahektha ayisithupha noma ayisikhombisa amasimu, okuwumsebenzi onzima.
(Le ndaba isingathekiso sokusebenza kanzima, kodwa awunalutho.)
聖意: Indlu izoba sengozini kuqala bese kuza okuhle.Qaphela ukufuna ingcebo, wenze isivumelwano, futhi ube nomshado.Kuzotholakala owesilisa ohamba ngezinyawo uYoshida Canli, isilwane sesithupha.Kuzoba necala lomphakathi, futhi kuyoba khona icala.Ukufuduka, ukulahleka kwempahla, ukugula, nokufisa intaba nethuna kuyinto enhle.
